zh.DialogTips.index.0645616-6: 点击具体产品的查看按钮,进入“设备接入”tab页，并参照设备铭牌说明选择匹配的接入方式
zh.DialogTips.index.0645616-8: 进入设备列表，添加单个设备，用于验证产品模型是否配置正确
zh.DialogTips.index.0645616-10: 点击查看具体设备，进入“设备诊断”对添加的测试设备进行功能调试，验证能否连接到平台，设备功能是否配置正确
zh.DialogTips.index.0645616-12: 进入设备列表页面，点击批量导入设备，批量添加同一产品下的设备

en.DialogTips.index.0645616-6: Click the view button for the specific product to enter the "Device Access" tab page, and refer to the device nameplate instructions to select the matching access method
en.DialogTips.index.0645616-8: Enter the device list and add a single device to verify if the product model is configured correctly
en.DialogTips.index.0645616-10: Click to view specific devices, enter "Device Diagnosis" to debug the added testing devices, verify whether they can connect to the platform, and whether the device functions are configured correctly
en.DialogTips.index.0645616-12: Enter the device list page, click on batch import devices, and batch add devices under the same product
